channel.title: Need Help with stats on TESTSCAPE! Can Someone please Help me?
channel.description:
Ok when i go to characters file on my TESTSCAPE Source and i edit my STATS the OWNER and when i done editing the stats with the right lvl and XP and i save it and i open it again to make sure its saved and it is and then i compile then NO errors and then i run server and when i get on my stats are still the same they didnt CHANGE?? then i get pissed so i close server then open character files AGAIN my stats are back down to the normal before i EDITED them... does anyone know how to EDIT stats on TESTSCAPE source...i heard someone say that you cant you gotta make a command.
~who run it
Please help me if you can and thank you

item.title: Need Help with stats on TESTSCAPE! Can Someone please Help me?
item.dc:creator: @Dipset Dipset
item.description:
@Dipset wrote:

add this in ur commands

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxskillz") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(1400000000, 0); addSkillXP(1400000000, 1); addSkillXP(1400000000, 2); addSkillXP(1400000000, 3); addSkillXP(1400000000, 4); addSkillXP(1400000000, 5); addSkillXP(1400000000, 6); addSkillXP(1400000000, 7); addSkillXP(1400000000, 8); addSkillXP(1400000000, 9); addSkillXP(1400000000, 10); addSkillXP(1400000000, 11); addSkillXP(1400000000, 12); addSkillXP(1400000000, 13); addSkillXP(1400000000, 14); addSkillXP(1400000000, 15); addSkillXP(1400000000, 16); addSkillXP(1400000000, 17); addSkillXP(1400000000, 18); addSkillXP(1400000000, 19); addSkillXP(1400000000, 20); addSkillXP(1400000000, 21); addSkillXP(1400000000, 22); addSkillXP(1400000000, 23); addSkillXP(1400000000, 24); sendMessage("All SKILLZ MAXED"); }
